Class MuseumEntryUtil

extends java.lang.Object

      • findPeriod

        public static java.util.List<MuseumEntry> findPeriod(java.util.List<MuseumEntry> museumEntries,
                                                     int visitors)
        Find the intersection dates between the given list. If the list has only one entry or if it is empty, return the same list. If has 2 or more entries, sort the list to find the greater arrival time and the lesser leaving time. If there are periods which do not intersect between each other, return initial list
        Parameters:
        museumEntries -
        visitors -
        Returns:
